text: I was surprised that `1:typemax(Int)` would terminate after the left hand side was satisfied, but I now realize that the `(x for i in ...)` expression creates a Generator and the generator is only called upon to generate as many values as the LHS requires.  Not sure why, but the premature termination of an infinite iterator seemed less problematic to me that premature termination of a finite iterator... :man-shrugging: :sweat_smile:
